mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.content_id AS contentId, a.title, ct.content_type_name AS contentType, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.addr1 AS address, a.first_image1 AS firstImage1, a.hit, a.views FROM attractions a LEFT JOIN contenttypes ct ON a.content_type_id = ct.content_type_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT a.no, a.content_id AS contentId, a.title, ct.content_type_name AS contentType, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.addr1 AS address, a.first_image1 AS firstImage1, a.hit, a.views FROM attractions a LEFT JOIN contenttypes ct ON a.content_type_id = ct.content_type_id WHERE (#{sidoCode} IS NULL OR a.area_code = #{sidoCode}) AND (#{gugunCode} IS NULL OR a.si_gun_gu_code = #{gugunCode}) AND (#{type} IS NULL OR a.content_type_id = #{type}) AND (#{word} IS NULL OR a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')) ORDER BY ${sortColumn} ${sortDirection} LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attractions WHERE (#{sidoCode} IS NULL OR area_code = #{sidoCode}) AND (#{gugunCode} IS NULL OR si_gun_gu_code = #{gugunCode}) AND (#{type} IS NULL OR content_type_id = #{type}) AND (#{word} IS NULL OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%'))

SELECT no, content_id AS contentId, title, content_type_id AS contentTypeId, area_code AS areaCode, si_gun_gu_code AS siGunGuCode, latitude, longitude, first_image1 AS firstImage1, first_image2 AS firstImage2, map_level AS mapLevel, tel, addr1, addr2, overview, hit, views FROM attractions WHERE no = #{attractionId}
